nodes.id: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院

zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院
台北帝国大学医学部附属医院
国立台湾大学医学院第一附属医院
国立台湾大学医学院附属医院

description.zh-cn: 台湾第一所提供西式医疗服务的教学医院，被视为台湾最具指标意义的医院。
description.en: The first teaching hospital in Taiwan to provide Western medical services, considered the most iconic hospital in Taiwan.

en: National Taiwan University College of Medicine

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾大学的医学院，为台大医院的管理机构。
description.en: The medical school of National Taiwan University, which serves as the administrative body for the National Taiwan University Hospital.

description.zh-cn: 台湾日治时期于台北市设立的一所帝国大学，为国立台湾大学的前身。
description.en: An imperial university established in Taipei during the Japanese colonial period, the predecessor of National Taiwan University.

description.zh-cn: 台湾日治时期的最高统治机关。
description.en: The supreme ruling authority in Taiwan during the period of Japanese rule.

en: Ministry of the Army of Japan

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国的行政机关，负责管辖陆军。
description.en: An administrative body of the Empire of Japan responsible for the administration of the Imperial Japanese Army.

description.zh-cn: 台湾总督府技师，设计了1921年重建的台大医院建筑。
description.en: An engineer of the Governor-General of Taiwan, who designed the reconstruction of the National Taiwan University Hospital building in 1921.

description.zh-cn: 设计师，设计了1898年建造的台湾总督府台北医院。
description.en: Designer of the Governor-General of Taiwan Taipei Hospital built in 1898.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家、教育家，曾任国立台湾大学校长。
description.en: Chinese historian and educator, former president of National Taiwan University.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of the Republic of China.

nodes.id: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院癌医中心分院

zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院癌医中心分院
国立台湾大学医学院附设癌医中心医院
en: National Taiwan University Hospital, Cancer Center Branch

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院的癌症专科分院，前身为国军八一七医院。
description.en: A specialized cancer branch of the National Taiwan University Hospital, formerly the ROC Armed Forces 817 Hospital.

description.zh-cn: 前国军医院，于2000年由台大医院接收，后改建为癌医中心分院。
description.en: A former military hospital that was taken over by NTU Hospital in 2000 and later rebuilt into the Cancer Center Branch.

description.zh-cn: 台湾企业家，鸿海集团创办人，透过永龄健康基金会捐赠兴建台大癌医中心医院。
description.en: Taiwanese entrepreneur, founder of Hon Hai Group, who donated to build the NTU Cancer Center Hospital through the YongLin Healthcare Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 由郭台铭创办的基金会，捐赠兴建台大癌医中心医院。
description.en: A foundation established by Terry Gou that donated to build the NTU Cancer Center Hospital.

en: Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 由郭台铭创办的跨国电子代工公司。
description.en: A multinational electronics contract manufacturing company founded by Terry Gou.

nodes.id: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院云林分院

zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院云林分院
en: National Taiwan University Hospital Yunlin Branch

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院的分院，前身为台湾省立云林医院。
description.en: A branch of National Taiwan University Hospital, formerly Taiwan Provincial Yunlin Hospital.

zh-cn: 行政院卫生署云林医院

description.zh-cn: 前省立医院，于2004年4月改制为台大医院云林分院。
description.en: A former provincial hospital that was restructured into the NTU Hospital Yunlin Branch in April 2004.

nodes.id: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院北护分院

zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院北护分院
en: National Taiwan University Hospital Bei-Hu Branch

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院的分院，前身为国立台北护理学院附设医院。
description.en: A branch of National Taiwan University Hospital, formerly the National Taipei College of Nursing Affiliated Hospital.

nodes.id: 国立台北护理学院附设医院

zh-cn: 国立台北护理学院附设医院
台湾省立台北高级医事职业学校附设妇幼卫生中心
台湾省立台北高级护理助产职业学校附设妇幼卫生中心
台湾省立护理专科学校附设妇幼卫生中心
国立台北护理专科学校附设妇幼卫生中心
国立台北护理专科学校附设医疗卫生中心
国立台北护理专科学校附设医院
en: National Taipei College of Nursing Affiliated Hospital

description.zh-cn: 前护理学院附设医院，于2004年8月1日改制为台大医院北护分院。
description.en: A former nursing college affiliated hospital that was restructured into the NTU Hospital Bei-Hu Branch on August 1, 2004.

nodes.id: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院金山分院

zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院金山分院
en: National Taiwan University Hospital Jinshan Branch

location.en: Jinshan District, New Taipei City, Taiwan

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院的分院，前身为财团法人北海岸金山医院。
description.en: A branch of National Taiwan University Hospital, formerly the North Coast Jinshan Hospital Foundation.

nodes.id: 财团法人北海岸金山医院

zh-cn: 财团法人北海岸金山医院

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾北海岸的医院，于2010年10月1日改制为台大医院金山分院。
description.en: A hospital located on the northern coast of Taiwan, which was restructured into the NTU Hospital Jinshan Branch on October 1, 2010.

description.zh-cn: 捐赠土地以兴建财团法人北海岸金山医院。
description.en: Donated land for the construction of the North Coast Jinshan Hospital Foundation.

nodes.id: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院新竹台大分院

zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院新竹台大分院
en: National Taiwan University Hospital Hsin-Chu Branch

location.en: Hsinchu County and Hsinchu City, Taiwan

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院的分院，由原新竹医院、竹东医院及生医分院整并而成。
description.en: A branch of National Taiwan University Hospital, formed by the consolidation of the original Hsinchu Hospital, Zhudong Hospital, and Biomedical Branch.

nodes.id: 行政院卫生署新竹医院

zh-cn: 行政院卫生署新竹医院
新竹州新竹市新竹医院

description.zh-cn: 前署立医院，于2011年7月1日改隶台大医院，后整并为新竹台大分院新竹医院。
description.en: A former Department of Health hospital, which became affiliated with NTU Hospital on July 1, 2011, and was later integrated as the Hsinchu Hospital of the NTU Hsin-Chu Branch.

nodes.id: 行政院卫生署竹东医院

zh-cn: 行政院卫生署竹东医院

description.zh-cn: 前署立医院，于2011年7月1日改隶台大医院，后整并为新竹台大分院生医医院竹东院区。
description.en: A former Department of Health hospital, which became affiliated with NTU Hospital on July 1, 2011, and was later integrated as the Zhudong campus of the Biomedical Hospital of the NTU Hsin-Chu Branch.

nodes.id: 台大医院失误移植爱滋病患器官案

zh-cn: 台大医院失误移植爱滋病患器官案

description.zh-cn: 2011年台大医院将一名HIV感染者的器官移植给五名病患的医疗事故。
description.en: A medical incident in 2011 where National Taiwan University Hospital transplanted organs from an HIV-positive donor to five patients.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物与医师，曾任台大医院器官移植小组负责人，后因爱滋器官移植事件辞职。
description.en: Taiwanese politician and physician, former head of the organ transplant team at NTU Hospital, who resigned after the AIDS organ transplant incident.

description.zh-cn: 台湾医师、医学教授，国立台湾大学医学院第一任院长及台大医院战后第一任院长。
description.en: Taiwanese physician and medical professor, the first Dean of National Taiwan University College of Medicine and the first superintendent of NTU Hospital after WWII.

description.zh-cn: 台湾医师，国立台湾大学医学院附设医院第16任院长。
description.en: Taiwanese physician, the 16th Superintendent of National Taiwan University Hospital.

description.zh-cn: 台湾医师，国立台湾大学医学院附设医院现任院长。
description.en: Taiwanese physician, the current Superintendent of National Taiwan University Hospital.

description.zh-cn: 台大医院妇产科医师，因涉及性骚扰案件而辞职。
description.en: An obstetrician-gynecologist at NTU Hospital who resigned due to involvement in a sexual harassment case.

relationships.source: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院
relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院是国立台湾大学医学院的附设教学医院。
description.en: National Taiwan University Hospital is the affiliated teaching hospital of the National Taiwan University College of Medicine.

relationships.source: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院
relationships.target: 台北帝国大学

description.zh-cn: 1938年4月1日，医院成为“台北帝国大学医学部附属医院”。
description.en: On April 1, 1938, the hospital became the 'Taihoku Imperial University Faculty of Medicine Affiliated Hospital'.

relationships.source: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院
relationships.target: 台湾总督府

description.zh-cn: 1898年，医院更名为“台湾总督府台北医院”，直属于台湾总督府。
description.en: In 1898, the hospital was renamed 'Governor-General of Taiwan Taipei Hospital' and was directly subordinate to the Governor-General of Taiwan.

relationships.source: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院
relationships.target: 陆军省

description.zh-cn: 1895年医院创建时名为“大日本台湾病院”，属陆军省军医部管辖。
description.en: When the hospital was founded in 1895 as 'Great Japan Taiwan Hospital', it was under the jurisdiction of the Army Medical Department of the Ministry of the Army.

relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院

description.zh-cn: 近藤十郎设计了1912年开始重建、1921年完工启用的台大医院西址建筑。
description.en: Kondo Juro designed the west wing building of NTU Hospital, which was rebuilt starting in 1912 and completed in 1921.

relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院

description.zh-cn: 小原益知设计兴建了1898年迁至现址的“台湾总督府台北医院”。
description.en: Ohara Masutomo designed and built the 'Governor-General of Taiwan Taipei Hospital' which moved to its current location in 1898.

relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院

description.zh-cn: 1950年，时任台大校长傅斯年将医院名称从“附属医院”改为“附设医院”。
description.en: In 1950, then-NTU President Fu Ssu-nien changed the hospital's name from 'Affiliated Hospital' (Fushu Yiyuan) to 'Attached Hospital' (Fushe Yiyuan).

relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院癌医中心分院

description.zh-cn: 2000年，行政院核定台大医院接收国军八一七医院，该院区后发展为癌医中心分院。
description.en: In 2000, the Executive Yuan approved NTU Hospital's takeover of the ROC Armed Forces 817 Hospital, which was later developed into the Cancer Center Branch.

relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院癌医中心分院

description.zh-cn: 郭台铭代表永龄健康基金会捐赠新台币二百二十亿元给台大，用于兴建台大癌医中心医院。
description.en: Terry Gou, on behalf of the YongLin Healthcare Foundation, donated NT$22 billion to National Taiwan University for the construction of the NTU Cancer Center Hospital.

relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院癌医中心分院

description.zh-cn: 永龄健康基金会捐赠新台币二百二十亿元给台大，用于兴建台大癌医中心医院。
description.en: The YongLin Healthcare Foundation donated NT$22 billion to National Taiwan University for the construction of the NTU Cancer Center Hospital.

relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院云林分院

description.zh-cn: 2004年4月，奉行政院核示，行政院卫生署云林医院（前身为台湾省立云林医院）改制为“台大医院云林分院”。
description.en: In April 2004, under the direction of the Executive Yuan, the Department of Health Yunlin Hospital (formerly Taiwan Provincial Yunlin Hospital) was restructured into the 'NTU Hospital Yunlin Branch'.

relationships.source: 国立台北护理学院附设医院
relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院北护分院

description.zh-cn: 2004年8月1日，国立台北护理学院附设医院改制为“台大医院北护分院”。
description.en: On August 1, 2004, the National Taipei College of Nursing Affiliated Hospital was restructured into the 'NTU Hospital Bei-Hu Branch'.

relationships.source: 财团法人北海岸金山医院
relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院金山分院

description.zh-cn: 2010年10月1日，财团法人北海岸金山医院完成改制为“台大医院金山分院”。
description.en: On October 1, 2010, the North Coast Jinshan Hospital Foundation completed its restructuring into the 'NTU Hospital Jinshan Branch'.

relationships.target: 财团法人北海岸金山医院

description.zh-cn: 郑玉炉捐赠土地以兴建财团法人北海岸金山医院。
description.en: Zheng Yu-lu donated land for the construction of the North Coast Jinshan Hospital Foundation.

relationships.source: 行政院卫生署新竹医院
relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院新竹台大分院

description.zh-cn: 2011年7月1日，行政院卫生署新竹医院改隶台湾大学医学院附设医院，后整并为新竹台大分院。
description.en: On July 1, 2011, the Department of Health Hsinchu Hospital became affiliated with National Taiwan University Hospital and was later integrated into the NTU Hospital Hsin-Chu Branch.

relationships.source: 行政院卫生署竹东医院
relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院新竹台大分院

description.zh-cn: 2011年7月1日，行政院卫生署竹东医院改隶台湾大学医学院附设医院，后整并为新竹台大分院。
description.en: On July 1, 2011, the Department of Health Zhudong Hospital became affiliated with National Taiwan University Hospital and was later integrated into the NTU Hospital Hsin-Chu Branch.

relationships.source: 台大医院失误移植爱滋病患器官案
relationships.target: 柯文哲

description.zh-cn: 因台大医院失误移植爱滋病患器官案，时任器官移植小组负责人柯文哲医师担负政治责任而辞职。
description.en: Due to the NTUH AIDS organ transplant incident, Dr. Ko Wen-je, then head of the organ transplant team, took political responsibility and resigned.

relationships.source: 台大医院失误移植爱滋病患器官案
relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院

description.zh-cn: 2011年8月27日，台大医院主动公布发生爱滋病患者器官移植的医疗事故，引发社会关注并导致院方被究责。
description.en: On August 27, 2011, NTU Hospital publicly announced a medical accident involving the transplantation of organs from an AIDS patient, drawing public attention and leading to the hospital being held accountable.

relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院

position.en: Head of the organ transplant team

relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院

description.zh-cn: 担任国立台湾大学医学院第一附属医院（台大医院前身）院长。
description.en: Served as the Superintendent of the First Affiliated Hospital of National Taiwan University College of Medicine (predecessor of NTUH).

relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院
国立台湾大学医学院附设医院
国立台湾大学医学院附设医院

description.zh-cn: 因涉及性骚扰案件后辞职。
description.en: Resigned after being involved in a sexual harassment case.
